hero.title2: I create content about web development.
hero.text: I learned how to create websites on my own, and now I want to share the tools I've acquired over the years. I know that it can be frustrating and challenging to make progress at times, which is why I create these videos. My aim is to help you better understand the key frontend development languages and support you on your learning journey.

youtube.title: YouTube
youtube.text: Videos about web development, primarily covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. You'll discover tips, tricks, tutorials, and several completely free courses.
